categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The scouring of Mon Cala was a battle that took place in the orbit of Mon Cala during the Galactic Civil War between the New Republic and the Galactic Empire. The hit-and-fade strikes were part of a larger operation planned by Admiral Rae Sloane to lure the New Republic Defense Fleet away from the Nadiri Dockyards in order for the Empire to attack Project Starhawk.
